title: [Wording only] Adjust ProjectElement assertion wording
body:
### Context

We have over dozen of checks with following wording:

```
ErrorUtilities.VerifyThrow(Link == null, "External project");
```

It's bit criptic and need code investigation to find the reason. Let's clarify the wording

More details: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10673#discussion_r1769004507
